Keyword timeoff (nikureport)

Purpose
Set the Clarity project ID and name that the vacation time will be reported to.
Syntax timeoff <ID> <Name>
Arguments ID [STRING]
The Clarity project ID
Name [STRING]
The Clarity project name
Context nikureport
